meanings.def: the time between when it becomes light in the morning and when it becomes dark in the evening

meanings.def: easy to see or understand

meanings.def: everyone has good luck or success at some point in their life

meanings.def: an earlier period of time in your life or in history that is seen as better/worse than the present
